title: Amp CLI Configuration
description: Settings for Amp CLI and editor extensions

amp.experimental.planMode.description: Enable plan mode for collaborative planning. Agent can research but cannot edit files or run commands

amp.git.commit.ampThread.enabled.description: Add Amp-Thread trailer in git commits

amp.git.commit.coauthor.enabled.description: Add Amp as co-author in git commits

amp.terminal.commands.nodeSpawn.loadProf.description: Load environment profile before running commands

amp.todos.enabled.description: Enable TODOs tracking for managing tasks

amp.tools.disable.description: Disable specific tools by name. Use 'builtin:toolname' for builtin tools only. Glob patterns supported

amp.tools.stopTimeout.description: Seconds to wait before canceling a running tool
